title: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf | Academy of Achievement

quotes: But during World War II when the allies were fighting Germany, Liberia, being so close to the United States, with the emancipated slaves having founded the country, we identified with the Allied forces, and also declared war on Germany and expelled all of the Germans who were in the country.

roles.title: chief
quotes: Yes, he was a chief. He was a Gola chief. So absolutely, that really set him apart.

roles.title: German traders
quotes: My maternal grandfather came from Germany, and he was one of the many German traders that penetrated the West African coast and did business in one of our rural areas.
My maternal grandfather came from Germany, and he was one of the many German traders that penetrated the West African coast and did business in one of our rural areas.
